attributes.action: Microchip all children in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
Since the disapperance of April Jones, it has been all over facebook, I had seen that a lady had posted a comment on her local police page about microchipping children in the UK, which would  allow the Police to track them staright a way if they where to go missing or abducted.

The idea is to put a Microchip under their skin when they are young, but which can be removed when the child is older.

So if you agree that this would be a good way to protect the children of the UK form these predators then please sign this petition.

Thank you
